entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character, mentioned as looking up and seeing Hedwig soar towards him.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl, described as fluttering down onto Harry's shoulder and holding out her leg wearily.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character who stops talking abruptly when Hedwig arrives and watches anxiously as Hedwig lands on Harry's shoulder.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a character who watches anxiously with Hermione as Hedwig lands on Harry's shoulder.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned in the letter, saying he is back in the country and well hidden.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as being safely immersed in discussions about the Triwizard Tournament with his twin brother George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as being safely immersed in discussions about the Triwizard Tournament with his twin brother Fred.

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, as evidenced by him offering her bacon rinds and reading a letter from Sirius to Ron and Hermione.
Hermione is concerned for Hedwig's well-being, as evidenced by her watching anxiously as Hedwig lands on Harry's shoulder.
Ron is also concerned for Hedwig's well-being, as evidenced by his watching anxiously with Hermione as Hedwig lands on Harry's shoulder.
Sirius communicates with Harry through a letter, which is read out to Ron and Hermione by Harry.
